content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 19 Oct 2018To you, what is the best mode of investment at an early age (for now)? Property, stocks, options, gold or cryptocurrency?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 19 Oct 2018There is no best mode. You need to gauge your risk appetite. However, the general consensus is that you are able to take more risks when you are younger, as you have a longer time horizon to invest. Maybe you'd like to factor that into your considerations :)0 comments0
